thread.section_title: Foodler Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Foodler | foodler.com
thread.title: Timothy

author: Timothy
title: Timothy
text:
My review for Foodler as a company is one word; Awesome.
If you have any issues with the restaurant that you order from they tend to respond pretty quickly and take care of things professionally.
The only problem I have ever had with foodler orders is the delivery drivers.
I don't know if they are hired through foodler, or the individual restaurants, but 9/10 of the drivers don't even know what the word driveway means and they cause issues for me with my roommates by knocking on doors that I can't hear.
Maybe there is a way for Foodler to make it more apparent that there are delivery instructions on the orders so that even the really stupid drivers can figure out that when there is a line that says "Please call when here (insert phone number)," they are supposed to call!
Anyways #endrant
Thank you Foodler for taking care of me with my phone speaking anxiety and the convenience of online ordering. :)
